## SentEthersMosaicTransaction.getReceipt() method

Check whether the transaction has been mined, and whether it was successful.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getReceipt(): Promise<MosaicReceipt<EthersTransactionReceipt, T>>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[MosaicReceipt](./lib-base.mosaicreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;[EthersTransactionReceipt](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionreceipt.md)<!-- -->, T&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Unlike [waitForReceipt()](./lib-base.sentmosaictransaction.waitforreceipt.md)<!-- -->, this function doesn't wait for the transaction to be mined.
